dcterms:description: MNIST contains centered, 28x28 pixel grayscale images of single-digit numbers on a black background, with 60,000 images for training and 10,000 for validation.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: MNIST-M contains centered, 32x32 pixel digits on a variant background substituted by randomly extracted patches from color photos, with 59,000 images for training and 1,000 for validation.
dcterms:title: MNIST-M

dcterms:description: SVHN is a challenging real-world dataset containing street view house numbers, consisting of 73,257 images for training and 26,032 images for validation.
dcterms:title: SVHN
